Room.Name: The Red Eye Pub and Grill
Room.ShortDescription: You are in one of the loud and rowdy bars in the northern section of town.
Room.LongDescription: The Red Eye Pub is ideal for finding out information about various items or objects of interest. The pub is freqented by numerous bards who know much more than they let on. Many bards gain the confidence of great leaders, thus find out more information that they can effectively put into riddles and songs.
